mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE( MS_SEQ, USERID, MS_TITLE, MS_CONTENT, MS_DATE, MS_SENDER, MS_CONTENT2, MS_DEL1, MS_DEL2, MS_VDATE )VALUES( MS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{ms_title}, #{ms_content}, SYSDATE, #{ms_Sender}, #{ms_content2}, 1, 1, #{ms_vdate} )
mapper.select: SELECT MS_SEQ, USERID, MS_TITLE, MS_CONTENT, MS_DATE, MS_SENDER, MS_CONTENT2, MS_DEL1, MS_DEL2, MS_VDATE FROM MESSAGE WHERE MS_SENDER = #{userid} AND MS_DEL2 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE( MS_SEQ, USERID, MS_TITLE, MS_CONTENT, MS_SENDER, MS_DATE )VALUES( MS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{ms_title}, #{ms_content}, #{ms_Sender}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT MS_SEQ, USERID, MS_TITLE, MS_CONTENT, MS_SENDER, TO_CHAR(MS_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') MS_DATE FROM MESSAGE WHERE MS_SEQ=#{ms_seq} ORDER BY MS_DATE DESC
